name: Wings Academy
about: Wings Academy is a boutique flight school located at Salem Airport in Oregon, offering personalized and professional flight training. We help students achieve their aviation goals, whether it's becoming a private or commercial pilot. Our program, operated under Part-61 regulations, allows flexible payment plans as you progress through your training. We use the Piper Tomahawk (PA-38-112) for training, emphasizing safety and efficiency. Our curriculum is customizable to fit individual needs, and we provide comprehensive lesson plans and support. With a focus on safety and effective learning, Wings Academy is dedicated to helping you reach your flying aspirations. We look forward to guiding you on your journey to becoming a licensed pilot.
